name: Manticore: Galaxy on Fire
overview: Enjoy 8+ hours of play time and 60fps across all game modes as you follow a gripping narrative in three acts. Fly spectacular spaceships, master challenging missions and explore a handcrafted universe in the new sci-fi action shooter on Nintendo Switch! Experience stellar gameplay thanks to intuitive HUD and UI elements as well as full support of the Joy-Con and Switch Pro controllers with HD Rumble.
